name: Nokia Pay
description:
Nokia Pay is a game where you try to avoid obstacles! Keep in mind that gravity changes so you are either fast or slow. Don't forget collecting the coins! This adds a bit more difficulty. The controls are :

Jump = Numpad 5, Spacebar

Submit = +, Numpad +

In game Submit = Numpad +, Enter

Cancel = Numpad -, Backspace

Navigate:

Up = Numpad 8, Arrow up

Down = Numpad 2, Arrow Down

You can not only jump. Bounce against walls to jump higher!
